instructions: Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish.
name: bloody mary

ingredients: Dash of Angostura Bitters (adjust to taste)
instructions: Chill the glass, then coat the insnumberIde with the Bitters.  Add the gin very well chilled, garnish and serve.
name: pink gin

instructions: Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish.
name: ginza mary

ingredients: 4 oz Tonic water (Thomas Henry, to top)
instructions: Lighlly muddle the basil leaves. Add ingredients apart from tonic water and shake with ice. Strain into an ice-filled Collins glass and top up with tonic water. Granish with a lemon twist.
name: gin atomic

ingredients: 1 t Sugar (superfine, or 1/4 oz 50 brix simple syrup)
2 spg Basil (slapped, one muddled and one as garnish)
instructions: Build in julep glass over crushed ice, churn with barspoon, top with more crushed ice and a sprig of basil.
name: gin basil julep

instructions: Muddle 1/2 lemon with large handful basil, add simple and test for sweetness. Add ice and gin, shake, double strain, rocks-filled frozen old fashioned glass
name: gin basil smash

instructions: Stir, strain, up, lemon twist.
name: gin blossom

instructions: Shake, strain up, garnish
name: analogue's  gin and juice

instructions: Shake all ingredients except the soda water WITHOUT ICE very vigorously for at least one minute, preferably longer -- the longer the better. Then add ice and shake for 1-2 minutes, as long as you can manage, until extremely cold and frothy. Strain into a tall thin glass (no ice), or a very large old fashioned glass, and top with soda water. Stir gently.
name: ramos gin fizz

instructions: In a shaker, combine 1 1/2 oz. each gin and fresh grapefruit juice, 1/4 oz. lemon juice, and 3/4 oz. Luxardo maraschino. Shake with ice and strain into a double rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Top with 3/4 oz. Fernet Branca.
name: jaded gin daiquiri

instructions: Mix, then shake with ice to emulsify the oil and other ingredients. Tall glass with ice.
name: the difference engine

instructions: Mix and serve. Garnish with a slice of lime
name: vodka gimlet

instructions: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.
name: vodka martini

instructions: Shake, strain, dbl OF, garnish
name: old town vodka punch

instructions: Shake pineapple & ginger infused vodka, lime juice, vanilla syrup, and chocolate bitters.  Strain into Collins glass over crushed ice; Garnish with Angostura bitters and mint sprigs.
name: sweatpants & vodka

instructions: Mix in pitcher with crushed ice, shake vigorously until a frothing head appears. Strain into cocktail glasses. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry. Serves 6.
name: rum swizzle

ingredients: 1 oz Bermuda rum, Gosling's Black Seal
instructions: Swizzle in a footed Pilsner glass and garnish.
name: ruby rum

ingredients: 2 ds Orange bitters, Regans' orange bitters
instructions: Shake, double strain, up.
name: sex in the rumble seat

ingredients: 1/2 oz Virgin Islands Rum, Cruzan Blackstrap
instructions: Stir with ice, strain into absinthe-rinsed coupe.
name: expense account rum cocktail

ingredients: 1/2 oz Apricot liqueur, Marie Brizard Apry
1 ds Bitters, Fee Brothers Old Fashion
instructions: Shake, pour unstrained into a DOF or Tiki mug.
name: the man with the golden rum

instructions: Shake, strain, garnish.
name: snare drum

instructions: Stir, strain, rocks, twist.
name: three-rum old fashioned (franklin mortgage & investment co)

ingredients: 1 1/2 oz Rhum Agricole (Rhum Agricole clement premiere canne)
instructions: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail coupe, and garnish with a grapefruit twist.
name: inherent vice (rumdood)

instructions: Put seltzer in Collins or highball. Shake remaining ingredients with ice and double strain into glass. Gently add ice. Garnish with hibiscus flower or lime wheel.
name: hibiscus rum punch

ingredients: 1 oz Puerto Rican Rum, Bacardi Facundo NEO
1 ds Bitters, Dr Adam Elmegirab's Orinoco Bitters
instructions: Build over big chunks of ice in a DOF glass and stir. Garnish with fresh grated lemon zest.
name: rum & cola (blacktail)

instructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice.  Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom.  Stir gently to create the sunrise effect.  Garnish and serve.
name: aperol sunrise

instructions: Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice. Stir gently.
name: aperol spritz

ingredients: 1/2 oz Lemon juice (juice of half a lemon)
instructions: Shake, strain over Champagne, twist.
name: aperol flip

instructions: Stir, strain, straight up, cocktail glass, garnish
name: intro to aperol

instructions: Shake, strain, garnish.
name: nishla tequila orange campari

instructions: Stir, strain, up, twist.
name: campari "martini"

instructions: Shake, strain, garnish with cherry.
name: campari sour #3

ingredients: 2 spg Mint (one muddled, one as garnish)
instructions: Muddle, shake, strain over crushed ice, garnish.
name: campari stinger

instructions: Swizzle with crushed ice in a tall thin glass until frost forms.
name: campari swizzle

ingredients: 1 oz Orange liqueur, Clement Creole Shrubb (or other orange liqueur)
instructions: Shake, strain, up, twist.
name: camparipolitan
